```{r, echo=FALSE}
packages <- c(
  'ggplot2',
  'ggrepel',
  'patchwork',
  'ggraph',
  'dplyr',
  'gganimate',
  'gifski',
  'ggforce',
  'ggthemes',
  'maps',
  'sf',
  'tidyr',
  'concaveman',
  'remotes'
)

#install.packages(packages)

library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
data("faithful")
ggplot(data = faithful) +
  geom_histogram(mapping = aes(x = eruptions, fill = eruptions < 3.1),
                 colour = "blue")
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = faithful) +
  geom_histogram(mapping = aes(x = eruptions, colour = eruptions < 3.2))
# notice the legend
```
